recipes.name: Carbonara Pasta
recipes.ingredients:
Pasta
Eggs
Parmesan Cheese
Pancetta
Garlic
Black Pepper
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions
2. Fry pancetta until crispy
3. Mix eggs and cheese
4. Combine all ingredients
5. Add black pepper to taste

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients:
Romaine Lettuce
Croutons
Parmesan Cheese
Caesar Dressing
Grilled Chicken
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop lettuce
2. Add croutons
3. Sprinkle cheese
4. Add dressing
5. Top with chicken

recipes.name: Turkey Club Sandwich
recipes.ingredients:
Bread
Turkey Breast
Bacon
Lettuce
Tomato
Mayo
recipes.instructions:
1. Toast bread
2. Layer turkey
3. Add bacon
4. Add vegetables
5. Spread mayo

recipes.name: Salami Pizza

Pizza Dough

Onions

2. Add sauce
3. Add cheese
4. Add toppings
